subtitle.en-US: Looking for a digital customer experience (CX) partner? Give us a shout!

linksSubtitle.de: Nehmen Sie Kontakt mit uns auf
linksSubtitle.fr: Vous recherchez un partenaire Digital Customer Experience (CX) ? Appelez-nous!
linksSubtitle.pl: Szukasz partnera Digital Customer Experience (CX)? Zadzwoń do nas!
linksSubtitle.tr: Dijital Müşteri Deneyimi (CX) iş ortağı mı arıyorsunuz? Bizi arayın!

salesLinkDescription.de: Lassen Sie uns darüber sprechen, wie wir Sie und Ihre Kunden unterstützen können.
salesLinkDescription.en-US: Let’s talk about how we can support your customers, or schedule a demo to see our Digital CX and/or AI Data solutions in action.
salesLinkDescription.pl: Porozmawiajmy o tym, jak możemy wspierać Twoich klientów.

careersLinkDescription.de: Teil unseres Teams zu werden klingt reizvoll? Jetzt einen unserer Standorte auswählen, um zu beginnen.
careersLinkDescription.en-US: Explore employment opportunities or contact the talent acquisition team for assistance with job applications or HR related inquiries.
careersLinkDescription.fr: Souhaitez-vous travailler dans l'un de nos bureaux ?  Choisissez l'un de nos emplacements pour commencer.
careersLinkDescription.pl: Chcesz pracować w jednym z naszych miedzynarodowych biur? Wybierz jedną z naszych lokalizacji, aby rozpocząć.
careersLinkDescription.tr: Global ofislerimizden birinde çalışmak ister misiniz? Başlamak için lokasyonlarımızdan birini seçin.

salesSubtitle.de: Lassen Sie uns darüber sprechen, wie wir Ihr Unternehmen unterstützen können.
salesSubtitle.en-US: Let's discuss your customer experience and/or digital IT needs.
salesSubtitle.fr: Echangeons sur vos expériences clients et/ou sur vos besoins en informatique numérique.
salesSubtitle.pl: Porozmawiajmy o Twoim doświadczeniu klienta i/lub potrzebach w zakresie cyfrowego IT.
salesSubtitle.tr: Müşteri deneyiminizi ve/veya dijital BT ihtiyaçlarınızı görüşelim.

demoSubtitle.en-US: Tell us what you'd like to see in digital CX innovation - Bots, RPA, AI Training Data - and more.

ccpaSubtitle.en-US: If you’re a California resident and would like to make some changes to your personal information, let us know.

helpCompanyFieldName.de: Lassen Sie uns wissen, wie wir Ihrem Unternehmen helfen können
helpCompanyFieldName.en-US: Let us know how we can help your company, or which type of solution demo you would like to see
helpCompanyFieldName.pl: Daj nam znać, jak możemy pomóc Twojej firmie
helpCompanyFieldName.tr: İşletmenize nasıl yardımcı olabileceğimizi bize bildirin

helpCompanyFieldPlaceholder.de: Bitte geben Sie Details zu Ihrem Interesse an einer Zusammenarbeit mit uns an
helpCompanyFieldPlaceholder.en-US: Please provide any details about your interest in working with us
helpCompanyFieldPlaceholder.pl: Podaj szczegóły dotyczące Twojego zainteresowania współpracą z nami
helpCompanyFieldPlaceholder.tr: Lütfen bizimle çalışmak için ilgilendiğiniz alanları belirtin

privacyPolicy.de:
Wir verwenden diese Informationen ausschließlich für die beabsichtigten Zwecke der Kontaktaufnahme mit Ihnen aufgrund Ihrer Anfrage, mit jemandem von TELUS International zu sprechen. Diese Informationen können an unsere verbundenen Unternehmen bei TELUS International Inc., TELUS International U.S. Corp. und TELUS International Europe weitergegeben werden, um Ihre Anfrage ordnungsgemäß zu beantworten.

Für weitere Details erfahren Sie hier mehr über unsere [Datenschutzrichtlinie für Kunden](https://www.telusinternational.com/de/privacypolicy "Datenschutzrichtlinie für Kunden").
privacyPolicy.en-US:
We will use this information solely for its intended purposes of contacting you based on your request to speak to someone from TELUS International. This information may be shared with our affiliates at TELUS International Inc., TELUS International U.S. Corp., and TELUS International Europe in order to properly respond to your request.

For further details, learn more about our [Customer Privacy Policy](https://www.telusinternational.com/privacypolicy "Customer Privacy Policy") here.
privacyPolicy.fr:
Nous n'utiliserons vos informations que dans le but de vous contacter au sujet de votre demande. Ces informations peuvent être partagées avec nos sociétés affiliées à TELUS International Inc., TELUS International US Corp. et TELUS International Europe pour répondre à vos attentes.

Pour plus de détails, en savoir plus sur notre politique de confidentialité des clients [ici](https://www.telusinternational.com/fr/privacypolicy "ici").
privacyPolicy.pl:
Wykorzystamy te informacje wyłącznie w zamierzonym celu skontaktowania się z Tobą w sprawie Twojej prośby o rozmowę z osobą kontaktową w TELUS International. Informacje te mogą być udostępniane naszym podmiotom stowarzyszonym w TELUS International Inc., TELUS International US Corp. i TELUS International Europe w celu odpowiedzi na twoją prośbę.

Aby uzyskać więcej informacji przeczytaj więcej o naszej polityce prywatności klienta [tutaj](https://www.telusinternational.com/pl/privacypolicy "tutaj").
privacyPolicy.tr:
Bu bilgileri yalnızca, TELUS International'daki bir kişiyle konuşma talebinizle ilgili olarak sizinle iletişim kurmak amacıyla kullanacağız. Talebinizi tam anlamıyla karşılayabilmek için bu bilgiler, TELUS International Inc., TELUS International US Corp. ve TELUS International Europe'daki bağlı şirketlerimizle paylaşılabilir.

Daha fazla ayrıntı için, burada müşteri gizlilik politikamız hakkında daha fazla bilgiye [ulaşabilirsiniz](https://www.telusinternational.com/tr/privacypolicy "ulaşabilirsiniz").

mqlPrivacyPolicyNonAi.en-US:
In providing your information, you agree to receive company news, solutions and thought leadership content from TELUS International on topics that cover digital CX innovation and best practices. We do not sell your information to third parties and you may unsubscribe at any time.

For further details, learn more about our [Customer Privacy Policy](https://www.telusinternational.com/privacypolicy).

mqlPrivacyPolicyAi.en-US:
In providing your information, you agree to receive company news, solutions and thought leadership content from TELUS International on topics that cover AI data innovation and best practices. We do not sell your information to third parties and you may unsubscribe at any time.

For further details, learn more about our [Customer Privacy Policy](https://www.telusinternational.com/privacypolicy).

subscribeCtaNonAi.en-US: I would also like to subscribe to receive content on AI data innovation and best practices.

subscribeCtaAi.en-US: I would also like to subscribe to receive content on digital CX innovation and best practices.
